title: Senior Project Manager (Fluent in Swedish)
description:
**Role:** Senior Project Manager / Technical Consultant / Application Consultant
  
**Seniority Level:** Senior
  
**Location:** Härnösand, Sweden (Primarily Remote with Occasional Travel)
  
**Remote Work:** 100% remote preferred; occasional travel within Sweden (mainly to Örebro)
  
**Application Deadline:** June 25, 2025
  
  

**Assignment Purpose:**  

A Senior IT Project Manager to lead internal project activities and coordination with system vendors.
  
Technical and Application Consultants to provide expert support in their respective areas.
  
  

**Project Structure:**  

Project is led by a main project manager and two sub-project managers (Operations & Technology)
  
You will support the sub-project managers depending on your area of expertise
  
Close collaboration with business units, internal teams, and vendors
  
Focus on roll-out, training, change management, testing, and coordination
  
High integration with other systems—synchronization and system integrity post-migration is critical
  
  

**Assignment Scope & Tasks:****IT Project Manager (50%, ~1400 hours):**  

Lead project activities within the agency
  
Manage vendors and external suppliers
  
Plan, lead, and follow up on project deliverables
  
Organize and lead meetings (internal and external)
  
Plan and manage testing and validation
  
Accept and verify system deliveries
  
Prepare for training, rollout, and handover to operations
  
Report project status and escalate key decisions
  
  

**Technical Consultant (10%, ~4 hrs/week):**  

Answer technical queries regarding on-prem to cloud migration
  
Advise on integrations and technical configurations
  
Support the technical sub-project manager
  
  

**Application Consultant (10%, ~4 hrs/week):**  

Answer questions related to business use and configuration of Unit4 ERP
  
Provide expert knowledge on finance and payroll modules
  
Support the operations sub-project manager
  
  

**Mandatory Requirements:****IT Project Manager:**  

Experience managing ERP implementations or migrations in the past 3 years
  
Minimum 5 years of experience with Unit4 ERP (on-prem)
  
Experience migrating Unit4 ERP from on-prem to cloud
  
Familiarity with Unit4 ERP CR (cloud version) and Unit4 as a vendor
  
At least 4 years experience in leading system implementation projects
  
Must meet Framework Level 4
  
Fluent in spoken and written Swedish
  
  

**Technical Consultant:**  

Deep technical knowledge of Unit4 ERP and its integrations
  
Experience implementing or migrating ERP systems in the past 3 years
  
At least 5 years of experience with Unit4 ERP (on-prem)
  
Experience with cloud migration and Unit4 ERP CR
  
Must meet Framework Level 4
  
Fluent in spoken and written Swedish
  
  

**Application Consultant:**  

Strong knowledge of Unit4 ERP, especially Finance and Payroll modules
  
Experience with ERP implementation/migration in the past 3 years
  
At least 5 years of experience with Unit4 ERP (on-prem)
  
Experience with cloud version (Unit4 ERP CR)
  
Must meet Framework Level 4
  
Fluent in spoken and written Swedish

title: Project Manager
description:
We are looking for an experienced Project Manager to lead the rollout of a new Corporate Performance Management (CPM) system focused on financial consolidation and reporting. The ideal candidate will have strong project leadership experience across IT, business, and external vendors.
  
**Location:** Lund, Sweden. Onsite.
  
QUALIFICATIONS & COMPETENCIES
  
5–10 years’ experience leading cross-functional, enterprise-level projects
  
Strong organizational and communication skills with a structured, solution-oriented mindset
  
Experience working closely with IT, finance, and external implementation partners
  
Familiarity with financial consolidation, group reporting, or ERP implementation is an advantage
  
Project management certification such as PRINCE2, PMP (Project Management Professional), or PMI-ACP is required or strongly preferred
  
Experience with cloud-based systems and change management practices is a plus
  
Fluency in English, both written and spoken
  
Valid EU work permit making you able to start working in Sweden right away
  
  

AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY
  
Own and manage the full project lifecycle — planning, execution, monitoring, and closure
  
Lead coordination between key stakeholders in IT, business functions, and the software vendor
  
Maintain project governance, risk and issue management, and stakeholder alignment
  
Ensure delivery on time, within scope, and within budget
  
Support change management and facilitate smooth user
  
  

INTERESTED?
  
Please note that to apply for this position, you must go to our website. We are unable to process CVs sent directly to our email.
  
If you have questions about the position, please contact us on:
  
sweden@rdtengineers.com
  
The position will be closed when we have found the right candidate, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Notice only your CV in English is necessary.
  
Passionate about Engineering - RDT
  
At RDT, our primary focus is our PEOPLE. We support our employees in professional and individual development. With our flat hierarchy, commitment and values, which inspire them to do their best. We pursue our PEOPLE’s work satisfaction and can guarantee highest quality, which leads to our second mission – our CLIENTS. We, our PEOPLE, provide engineering solutions that enable our customers to have a competitive advantage in efficiency, flexibility and costs.
  
Thanks to our PEOPLE, we have supplied the best engineering services since 2007 and offer the best and most flexible terms in the market for engineering services.
  
Be part of our missions and join RDT in Denmark and Sweden.

title: Data Scientist - [F/M/X]
description:
Who are we?
   

  

**Amaris Consulting** 
 is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
   

  

 At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
   

  

**Brief Call** 
 : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
   

  

**Interviews** 
 (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
   

  

**Case study** 
 : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
   

  

 As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
   

  

 We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Design and deploy production-grade AI/ML solutions
* Perform data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation
* Collaborate with engineers, product teams, and domain experts
* Build scalable data pipelines on cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP)
* Fine-tune machine learning models (including LLMs and RAG)
* Communicate insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Stay updated with cutting-edge AI/ML advancements


**Technical Skills**
**Programming & Analytics:**
* Python (Pandas, PyTorch, TensorFlow)
* Advanced SQL for big data
* Jupyter Notebooks, Git version control


**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
* AWS/Azure/GCP (AI services and data pipelines)
* Containers: Docker, Kubernetes
* ETL: Airflow, PySpark, Kafka


**AI/ML Expertise:**
* Supervised & Unsupervised Learning
* Deep Learning architectures
* LLMs (fine-tuning, embeddings)


**Qualifications**
* Degree in Data Science, AI, or related field
* 3+ years experience deploying ML models in production
* Experience with cloud-based AI solutions
* Fluent in English (Swedish preferred)


*Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.*

title: Business Development Representative
description:
We are
 **SHERPANY** 
 - a young and award-winning tech company headquartered in Zurich. With our cloud/SaaS solution, we digitize meeting management and thus facilitate the decision-making processes of management bodies throughout Europe. Our in-house developed system transforms meetings from time wasters into value creators. Our customers include well-known medium-sized to large companies from all industries, such as Axpo, Emmi, Esprit, Swisscom and Swiss-Re, and many more.
 



 Are you an open-minded person who feels comfortable in a dynamic environment and enjoys working in an international team of passionate sales experts? Let's connect for future opportunities as a SDR in our sales team:
 



**Your area of responsibility:** 



* You will be responsible for identifying potential corporate customers and convincing them of our meeting management solution.
* To do this, you will identify decision-makers via various channels (LinkedIn, Xing, etc.) and make initial contact.
* Whether by phone or email, your aim is to arouse the other person's interest so that they want to find out more.
* You coordinate follow-up meetings between the sales executive and the outbound lead you have qualified.
* You carefully maintain the data in our CRM tool and ensure compliance with our sales processes.
* You take part in other sales and marketing activities, e.g. trade fairs



  





**What sets you apart:** 



* Sales is your passion and you want to go 'full throttle' in this area.
* You are 'fearless' when it comes to convincing decision-makers of our solution over the phone.
* You learn quickly, are curious, work independently and are results-oriented.
* You are fluent in Swedish and have a good level of English.



  





**Do you think you have what it takes, even if you don't fulfill 100% of the job description? Get in touch with us anyway! We hire for attitude!** 




  





**Why you should choose SHERPANY:** 



* You will be part of an international company with a flat hierarchy where you can take on a lot of personal responsibility and your ideas are always welcome.
* Your personal and professional development is important to us, which is why we offer financial support for further education, training, etc.
* Your personal well-being is important to us - our partner nilo.health supports you in this.
* We work with new technologies and Apple MacBooks, which will be provided to you when you start.
* Last but not least: Our corporate culture means a lot to us, which is why we regularly organize great team events and cultivate a value-oriented cooperation.



  





**Our application process:** 



* Send us your online application
* First interview with Talent Acquisition Specialist (30 min.)
* Second interview with Sales Enablement (30 min.)
* Final interview & RolePlay with VP Sales (30 min.)



**I look forward to your application! 😃**

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple" and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation for fostering an environment where diversity of thinking, skills and experiences are embraced, delivering innovation and better business results.
   

  

**Bring your authentic self to Sinch**
 Here at Sinch we embrace diversity and work to create an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. No matter who you are, you'll be able to explore new career and growth options - sharing your voice, building your path and making it happen with us.
   

  

 We're proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will be considered to join our team regardless of race, color, religion, creed, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, sex, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation, citizenship, or any other legally protected class.
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**

 If this role isn't what you're looking for, please consider other open roles on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/

title: ServiceNow Specialist
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story.
   

  

 Cognizant is a global leader within Information Technology Services (Fortune 500 since 2011). The company was founded in 1994, and the Head Quarters is still in USA. Cognizant, which was originally Dun & Bradstreets own inhouse bureau, serves the market with vertical solutions for digital automation (cloud, AI, IoT and analytics). Cognizant operates in industries like Health Care, Life Science, Banking and Finance, Insurance, Retail, Production, Logistics, Energy etc and is a key player within the Digital revolution. Cognizant Global has a revenue of USD 17 billion and nearly 300 000 employees.
   

  

 We are looking for a highly skilled ServiceNow Specialist with extensive knowledge in modules primarily HRSD, ITSM, and Service Portal to our office in Stockholm. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in analyzing, designing, developing/writing, and managing ServiceNow applications, with recent implementation experience in the HRSD module.
   

  

**The role**
 In this role, you will translate business requirements into technical specifications and create deliverables in different phases of the project life-cycle by decomposing functionality into specifications and business rules. You will produce business requirement documents (BRD), functional specifications, and business process flows. You will analyze business processes and perform gap analysis, impact analysis, and feasibility studies.
   

  

 You will liaise with onsite/offsite development teams on a daily basis to monitor project progress by tracking activity, resolving problems, publishing progress reports, and recommending actions. You will gather business requirements by interfacing with internal and external stakeholders and conduct analysis for application development. Additionally, you will facilitate requirement workshops.
   

  

 A detailed knowledge of Service Desk processes and ITIL standards is essential. You should have experience with ServiceNow implementation and knowledge in ServiceNow Orchestration. Good knowledge of ServiceNow Plugins, along with strong communication, presentation, and client handling skills, is required. Proficiency in Java Scripting and hands-on experience with ITIL process implementation is also necessary.
   

  

 You will be responsible for custom application design and development on the ServiceNow platform, with hands-on design, development, and deployment experience. You should be adept at creating required information for reporting and dashboards.
   

  

  
   

  

**Technical Expertise**
* Knowledge in HRSD Life Cycle, ITSM
* Customisation and Administration of ServiceNow Core Modules
* ServiceNow Client side and Server Side Scripting.
* Data importing using Import Sets (Data Source/Import Sets/Transform Maps)
* Service portal knowledge.
* Administration and creation of interactive portals.
* Strong in ITIL processes.
* ServiceNow Orchestration
* Provide software configuration and customization including, but not limited to: screen tailoring, workflow administration, report setup, data imports, integration, custom scripting and third party software integrations
* Obtain and analyze business requirements and document technical solutions
* Develop, design and rollout new application modules, workflows and catalog requests
* Research new functionality and recommend solutions that deliver customer value


**Preferred Skills**
* Understanding of Configuration Management as it relates to ITIL
* Web Services Integration (SOAP, REST, and JSON)
* Experience implementing systems using the Agile/Scrum methodology
* Experienced in the System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) processes including customer requirement analysis and system design
* Administration of a ServiceNow instance including the delegation of groups, modification of CMS, workflows, business rules, UI actions, UI policies, ACLs, dictionary, catalog items and updates of all other existing solutions requiring revisions
* ITIL certification is a plus
* RSD ServiceNow Implementer Certification is a plus


**Candidates Should Demonstrate Experience In The Following Areas**
* Design and delivery of technical solutions based on the ServiceNow platform
* Leadership skills in technical initiatives
* Generating detailed documentation
* Communications that clearly articulate solutions and the ability to perform demonstrations


**Language**
 Fluent in both English and Swedish, written as verbal.

title: Tjänsteägare Private Cloud
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Har du ett skarpt öga för Cloud-tjänster och IT-infrastruktur? Vill du vara en nyckelspelare som arbetar nära affären men samtidigt behålla en fot i tekniken? Mitt namn är Tony Granda och jag ansvarar för vår gruppering inom Cloud/Hybrid-IT på Telia Cygate. Jag söker just nu en Tjänsteägare inom Private Cloud till mitt team, kanske är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Är det här din nästa möjlighet?**
 I rollen som Tjänsteägare inom Private Cloud kommer du att äga och förvalta våra managerade tjänster av våra cloud lösningar som riktar sig mot våra kunder. I rollen arbetar du i gränslandet mellan våra affärsägare, levererande kundteam och tekniker med att säkerställa av våra tjänster uppfyller krav på kvalitet, lönsamhet, skalbarhet och effektivitet.
   

  

 Rollen som Tjänsteägare innebär stor variation i arbetsuppgifter där du får sätta din egen prägel på hur vi arbetar med och levererar Cloud-tjänster.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Arbete med att utveckla rutiner, processer och förvaltningsplaner för våra levererande team
* Besluta om tekniska vägval och design avseende våra tjänster
* Utföra omvärldsbevakning av teknikområdet för att säkerställa att vi erbjuder tjänster som kunderna vill ha
* Stötta sälj i pågående dialoger avseende driftavtal
* Ansvara för prognos och budget


**Är det här du?**
 För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har arbetat hands-on med teknik inom Cloud/Hybrid-IT och delar vår passion för att skapa kundnytta. Du har kunskap inom Managerade Tjänster och hur de är sammansatta, samt har en förmåga att förstå och sätta dig in i kundens verksamhet, syfte, behov, mål och strategier för att ta fram den bästa lösningen. Du är kommunikativ och affärsmässig och dina idéer kan du kommunicera till olika typer av stakeholders. Du kan ta ett kommersiellt ansvar för din tjänst och kan för den dialog med kund som krävs för att komma framåt i våra kunders digitala resa.
   

  

 Du behöver vara svensk medborgare och flytande kunskaper och språk i Svenska är ett krav.
   

  

**Varför Telia Cygate?**
 På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.
   

  

 Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.
   

  

 Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig påverkan
 **!**
**Låter det intressant? Ansök idag!**
 Ta chansen och bli en del av vårt härliga team! Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.
   

  

 Placeringsort: Stockholm, Malmö, Göteborg, Karlstad
   

  

 Om du har några frågor gällande den här specifika tjänsten så får du gärna kontakta Talent Acquisition Specialist Josefin Persson Ståhl på josefin.persson-stahl@teliacompany.com eller via LinkedIn. Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-08-17, men vi rekryterar löpande, så vänta inte för länge!
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll är en del i våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Prime Named Account Executive
description:
**Description**
**We're Salesforce** 
 , the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well
 *and* 
 doing good– you’ve come to the right place.
   

  

**Role Description**
 An opportunity has been created for a
 **Account Executive** 
**- Mulesoft** 
 to join the enterprise sales team. The role will focus on driving expansion in your local market in Sweden. This is an outstanding career opportunity for a sales professional looking to further their career in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Proactively identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline
* Strategically prospect into CTOs/CIO`s, Engineering/IT Leaders, and business executives
* Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities
* Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction
* Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes
* Participate in our sales enablement training, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs


**What You Will Bring To The Table**
* 5-7 years of field experience in quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market in Sweden
* Develop a strategy for prioritizing, targeting, and closing critical opportunities in assigned territory
* A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets
* Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology
* Skilled in building business and technical champions
* Driven and competitive. Possess a strong desire to be successful
* Fluent in English and Swedish + Right to Work in Sweden.


**Things we love to see in your application**
* Passionate about growing your career in a market leader
* Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)
* Familiarity with integration, API develops and automation technology


**MuleSof** 
**t** 
 is on a mission to connect the world’s applications, data and devices. $593B is spent each year connecting applications, data and devices, and the challenge is growing spectacularly with the explosion of cloud, big data, mobile and the Internet of Things. We’re “productizing” integration -- making it as easy to connect systems and companies as it is to communicate with friends on Social Media. MuleSoft’s Anypoint Platform™ enables companies to unlock the full potential of their applications and data through API-led connectivity, both on-premises and in the cloud, and our growth continues to accelerate. Our platform is used by organizations in over 60 countries, from emerging companies to Global 500 enterprises including Mastercard, Unilever, Tesla, Intuit, BSkyB and Verizon among others. We’re building a great company filled with outstanding people who challenge and encourage each other. MuleSoft is recognized as a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company and 2015 Best Place to Work by Glassdoor.
   

  

**Benefits & Perks**
 Check out our benefits site which explains our various benefits, including well-being reimbursement, generous parental leave, adoption assistance, fertility benefits, and more
   

  

**Accommodations**
 If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
*Att välja Capgemini innebär att välja ett företag där du får möjlighet att forma din karriär på det sätt du önskar. Här kommer att få stöd och inspiration inom en samarbetsvillig gemenskap med kollegor både lokalt och runt om i världen, som ständigt omdefinierar vad som är möjligt. Du kommer vara en del av området Cloud and Custom Application (C&CA) på Capgemini. Här kommer du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Cloud, Integration, AI och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi utvecklar skräddarsydda applikationer och hanterar komplexa integrationer för att maximera teknikens potential. Följ med oss och samarbeta med världens ledande organisationer för att realisera teknikens fulla värde genom innovativa lösningar*
**Om rollen**
 Som lösningsarkitekt har du en bred teknisk bakgrund samtidigt som du förstår verksamhetens behov och utmaningar och kan omsätta dessa till funktionella och icke-funktionella krav. Du kan hantera och mitigera risker, samla intressenter, har goda ledaregenskaper och är en duktig kommunikatör.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.
   

  

 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
   

  

 Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Din profil**
* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling, och vana av att leda andra
* Erfarenhet av arbete med etablerade metodiker och ramverk för arkitektur och agil systemutveckling.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska


**… och erfarenhet eller intresse av:**
* Konsultrollen samt av arbete med beslutsfattare
* Att verka utifrån kundens perspektiv och förmåga att analysera och utforma arkitektur och systemlösningar baserat på verksamhetens krav, processer och informationsbehov
* Molnbaserade lösningar, AI, säkerhet, processautomatisering eller integration
* Arbete som lösningsarkitekt i komplexa miljöer
* Certifierad IT-arkitekt


**Vad vi tror kommer att få dig att trivas**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Digital Architecture-team i Stockholm består av ca 20 kollegor som arbetar som Enterprise-, Verksamhets- och lösningsarkitekter hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.
* Våra värderingar: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Ansökan**
* Vi arbetar med löpande urval så vänta inte - skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Vi ser framemot din ansökan och att du vill bli en del av vår fortsatta resa!
* Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.


**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Delivery Consultant - Security, EMEA SE SDT
description:
**Description**
 The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking a skilled Delivery Consultant to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS).
   

  

 In this role, you'll work closely with customers to design, implement, and manage AWS solutions that meet their technical requirements and business objectives. You'll be a key player in driving customer success through their cloud journey, providing technical expertise and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 Possessing a deep understanding of AWS products and services, as a Delivery Consultant you will be proficient in architecting complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer. You’ll work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, assess current infrastructure, and propose effective migration strategies to AWS.
   

  

 As trusted advisor to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions, you will be responsible for leading the implementation process, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimizing performance, and managing risks throughout the project.
   

  

 The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud.
   

  

 We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Designing and implementing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions tailored to customer needs
* Providing technical guidance and troubleshooting support throughout project delivery
* Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and propose effective migration strategies
* Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies
* Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences:
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

**Inclusive Team Culture**
 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

**Mentorship & Career Growth**
 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* 3+ Years experience in IT security, compliance and risk management, privacy & controls, and security reference architectures for all-in and/or hybrid deployments
* Hands-on technical expertise in building security capabilities in code and deploying infrastructure in code such as WAF, Firewall, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM
* 3+ Years hands-on technical expertise in security architecture, technology automation, implementation, integration, and/or deployment
* Experience running big scale security engagements with customers and ability to travel to client locations to deliver professional services as needed
* Bachelor or Master degree in computer science or similar degree


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Scripting skills, i.e., PowerShell, Python, Node.js, Javascript, Bash, Ruby, Perl, etc. as well with Chef, Puppet, Salt, or Ansible in production environments at scale
* Technical expertise (design and/or implementation) in Cloud Computing technologies
* Experience in leading customer facing engagements such as risk assessment and management audits and experience building enterprise security strategy for cloud adoption or driving the program's evolution to meet new requirements
* Understanding implications of meeting industry standards such as PCI DSS, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and NIST/DoD frameworks


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2920440
